Anna Berger (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anna_Berger_(actress) 0 Anna Berger (July 26, 1922 – May 26, 2014) was an American character actress in film and television, who specialized in playing frazzled housewives and matriarchs. Anna_Berger ( July_26_,_1922 – May_26_,_2014 ) was an_American_character_actress in film_and_television , who specialized in playing frazzled_housewives_and_matriarchs .
